title: Wow, so there's an Algorithm (sort of) that allows you to win 8/10 games guaranteed
body:
Okay, so It only can guarantee it if you are below Gold 3 rank, also playing Support can make the grind still take longer, but this this shit allows you to climb by simply playing. you will have to own certain champions and build a few off color items but holy shit the videos demonstrating the strategies were unlike anything I've seen, just a mind fuck, like how the fuck has Riot not caught on to this shit? I even recognise some parts from what the pros do as far as ganking and warding techniques. I had no idea half this shit was allowed in general.

This **[Link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsIa_LKojJI) ** <------------  is worth it.
